explains: adj. 困惑的；不知所措的

sentences.en: It perplexed him because he was tackling it the wrong way.
sentences.cn: 这件事令他困惑和忧虑因为他处理得不对。

sentences.en: Aunt Polly paused, perplexed, and Tom looked for healing pity.
sentences.cn: 波莉姨妈愣住了，不知所措，汤姆希望她能说些好话。

sentences.en: Never was a company of people so perplexed, so interested, and so stupefied, before.
sentences.cn: 从来没有一群人如此困惑、如此感兴趣、如此不知所措。
